text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: [RESOLVED] Network Connectivity>
Between 5:13 AM and 5:53 AM PDT we experienced an Internet connectivity issue with an external provider outside of our network which affected traffic from some end-user networks and the SA-EAST-1 Region. Connectivity to instances and services within the Region was not impacted by the event. The issue has been resolved and connectivity has been restored.
